## About the Data
This is a dataset of the annual flow in $m^3$ of the Nile River at Aswan from 1871-1970. 

<!-- this code chunk loads in the MASS package of datasets and generates a summary of the Nile dataset in that package  --> 
```{r}
library(MASS)
summary(Nile)
```
